ygData.subject: Re: Laughing at Striker
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Striker again. I m sorry, but it s better this way. I....I don t know why, but I don t want to see you get hurt. Please just do as he says,

::Spears::

She looked at Striker again. "I'm sorry, but it's better this way. 
I....I don't know why, but I don't want to see you get hurt. Please 
just do as he says, please."  She walked over to the door and reached 
inside to touch him. (Not sure how close he is to the door or not)
She said in a soft voice,"Please,"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker glances at Spears, his optics emotionless. If they had been 
> activated, he would have been hurt by her apeal to Prebon. Erasing 
his 
> memories of her! He would rather die before let that happen.
> 
> He was still sure that Prebon wouldn't order her to self-destruct, 
but if he 
> gave in now, he knew that the Maximals would probably never see 
Spears again. 
> At least not as an ally.
> 
> He stands where he was, with the same resolution, looking at Prebon.
